title: TRIS - NTL Integrated Search
description: Search the Transportation Research Information Service (TRIS) database and the National Transportation Library (NTL) Catalog which includes both the Digital Repository and Portal Links to other transportation websites. This application, created to improve searching of all of these datasets provides a single point of entry, technology and search technique for these major resources. The application not only provides a sophisticated search facility, including full text search of the NTL Digital Collection, it also allows the user to capture the bibliographic information and export it to other applications for bibliography development.
